name: Diab Morta
description:
Diab. The lord of money. You are Morta, the last Doshomancer, a wizard that fights with money.  Diab's only weakness! Don't think about it too much. There's no time to think about it at all! Diab is here, and you must defeat him to save the humble village of Quadrail! The money! It's the only way to defeat him! Trust meeee...

Just a silly micro clicker game created for LowRezJam August 2022. I saw that someone in the jam made a Starcraft game and couldn't get this stupid idea out of my head. Made this in the last two days of the jam.
